metadata.title: CVE-2016-4303 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The parse_string function in cjson.c in the cJSON library mishandlesUTF8/16 strings, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(crash) or execute arbitrary code via a non-hex character in a JSON string,which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: iperf3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
